name: The Waiting Room Interactive Museum
description:
Welcome to the Waiting Room Interactive Museum!

I started this project in an attempt to archive and show off my digital work. As a digital artist that mainly creates interactive art & glitch art, it's hard to be able to take my work to shows. With this project I can point people to an engaging experience rather than social media pages for my art.

It'll grow over time as I develop as an artist. I do plan to release on other platforms in a later release. If you see anything that appears to be a bug please let me know!
